name: Sportsbook
0:
”Alexa open sports book”
”what is the spread for the Steelers?”
”what is the line for the Lakers?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports book
des:
Welcome to the Voice Sports Book! Your one-stop-shop for live sports lines! Bet responsibly and some things are bigger than sports!

--- Example Commands ---
TO START: 
"Alexa, Enable Sports Book"
"Alexa, Open Sports Book"
"Alexa, Ask Sports Book for the spread for the Steelers"

EXAMPLE PHRASES:
"what is the spread for the Steelers?
"what is the line for the Lakers?"
"what are all the odds for the Cowboys?"
"what is the money line for the Yankees?"
"what is the over-under for the Warriors?"
"what is the Cubs moneyline?"

FEEDBACK
Email treypezzetti@gmail.com.com if you have any issues or feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
